root.name: Evochron Mercenary
root.description: OverviewEvochron Mercenary is the sequel to Evochron Legends and rounds out the Evochron trilogy culminating in a game with the highest level of technology and most extensive feature set.Key points that make this game more unique than other Space sims:Seamless transitions between docking at stations and heading back into space, as well as going between star systems with no loading screens.Seamless transition and the ability to enter planetary atmosphere as well as explore the surface of a planet to go to cities, mine and explore.PC System RequirementsOS: Windows XP, Vista, 7Processor: 2.0 GHz AMD/IntelMemory: 1.5 GB RAMHard Disk Space: 750 MBVideo Card: 128 MB DirectX CompatibleDirectXÂ®: 9.0c
